title: "Resources"

Here are some resources that I've found helpful in introducing topics of educational measurement and data uses.

1. [Education Measurement](http://www.edmeasurement.net/index.html)
2. [Applying Equity to Data Vizualization](https://www.urban.org/research/publication/do-no-harm-guide-applying-equity-awareness-data-visualization)
3. [NCME ITEMS Portal](https://www.ncme.org/itemsportal)
4. [Social and Emotional Learning](https://casel.org)
5. [Open Access to The Standards for Educational and Psychological Testing](https://www.testingstandards.net/open-access-files.html)
